00040 namespace stable_ksort_local
00041 {
00042     template <class type_, class type_key>
00043     void classify_block(type_ * begin, type_ * end, type_key * & out, int_type * bucket, unsigned_type offset, unsigned shift)
00044     {
00045         for (type_ * p = begin; p < end; p++, out++) // count & create references
00046         {
00047             out->ptr = p;
00048             typename type_::key_type key = p->key();
00049             int_type ibucket = (key - offset) >> shift;
00050             out->key = key;
00051             bucket[ibucket]++;
00052         }
00053     }
00054 
00055     template <typename type>
00056     struct type_key
00057     {
00058         typedef typename type::key_type key_type;
00059         key_type key;
00060         type * ptr;
00061 
00062         type_key() { }
00063         type_key(key_type k, type * p) : key(k), ptr(p)
00064         { }
00065     };
00066 
00067     template <typename type>
00068     bool operator < (const type_key<type> & a, const type_key<type> & b)
00069     {
00070         return a.key < b.key;
00071     }
00072 
00073     template <typename type>
00074     bool operator > (const type_key<type> & a, const type_key<type> & b)
00075     {
00076         return a.key > b.key;
00077     }
00078 
00079 
00080     template <typename BIDType_, typename AllocStrategy_>
00081     class bid_sequence
00082     {
00083     public:
00084         typedef BIDType_ bid_type;
00085         typedef bid_type & reference;
00086         typedef AllocStrategy_ alloc_strategy;
00087         typedef typename simple_vector<bid_type>::size_type size_type;
00088         typedef typename simple_vector<bid_type>::iterator iterator;
00089 
00090     protected:
00091         simple_vector<bid_type> * bids;
00092         alloc_strategy alloc_strategy_;
00093 
00094     public:
00095         bid_sequence() { }
00096         bid_sequence(size_type size_)
00097         {
00098             bids = new simple_vector<bid_type>(size_);
00099             block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00100             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy_, bids->begin(), bids->end());
00101         }
00102         void init(size_type size_)
00103         {
00104             bids = new simple_vector<bid_type>(size_);
00105             block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00106             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy_, bids->begin(), bids->end());
00107         }
00108         reference operator [] (size_type i)
00109         {
00110             size_type size_ = size();             // cache size in a register
00111             if (i < size_)
00112                 return *(bids->begin() + i);
00113 
00114 
00115             block_manager * mng = block_manager::get_instance();
00116             simple_vector<bid_type> * larger_bids = new simple_vector<bid_type>((i + 1) * 2);
00117             std::copy(bids->begin(), bids->end(), larger_bids->begin());
00118             mng->new_blocks(alloc_strategy_, larger_bids->begin() + size_, larger_bids->end());
00119             delete bids;
00120             bids = larger_bids;
00121             return *(larger_bids->begin() + i);
00122         }
00123         size_type size() { return bids->size(); }
00124         iterator begin() { return bids->begin(); }
00125         ~bid_sequence()
00126         {
00127             block_manager::get_instance()->delete_blocks(bids->begin(), bids->end());
00128             delete bids;
00129         }
00130     };
00131 
00132     template <typename ExtIterator_>
00133     void distribute(
00134         bid_sequence<typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::block_type::bid_type,
00135                      typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy> * bucket_bids,
00136         int64 * bucket_sizes,
00137         const int_type nbuckets,
00138         const int_type lognbuckets,
00139         ExtIterator_ first,
00140         ExtIterator_ last,
00141         const int_type nread_buffers,
00142         const int_type nwrite_buffers)
00143     {
00144         typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type value_type;
00145         typedef typename value_type::key_type key_type;
00146         typedef typename ExtIterator_::block_type block_type;
00147         typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00148         typedef buf_istream<typename ExtIterator_::block_type,
00149                             typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator> buf_istream_type;
00150 
00151         int_type i = 0;
00152 
00153         buf_istream_type in(first.bid(), last.bid() + ((first.block_offset()) ? 1 : 0),
00154                             nread_buffers);
00155 
00156         buffered_writer<block_type> out(
00157             nbuckets + nwrite_buffers,
00158             nwrite_buffers);
00159 
00160         unsigned_type * bucket_block_offsets = new unsigned_type[nbuckets];
00161         unsigned_type * bucket_iblock = new unsigned_type[nbuckets];
00162         block_type ** bucket_blocks = new block_type *[nbuckets];
00163 
00164         std::fill(bucket_sizes, bucket_sizes + nbuckets, 0);
00165         std::fill(bucket_iblock, bucket_iblock + nbuckets, 0);
00166         std::fill(bucket_block_offsets, bucket_block_offsets + nbuckets, 0);
00167 
00168         for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; i++)
00169             bucket_blocks[i] = out.get_free_block();
00170 
00171 
00172         ExtIterator_ cur = first - first.block_offset();
00173 
00174         // skip part of the block before first untouched
00175         for ( ; cur != first; cur++)
00176             ++in;
00177 
00178 
00179         const int_type shift = sizeof(key_type) * 8 - lognbuckets;
00180         // search in the the range [_begin,_end)
00181         STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Shift by: " << shift << " bits, lognbuckets: " << lognbuckets);
00182         for ( ; cur != last; cur++)
00183         {
00184             key_type cur_key = in.current().key();
00185             int_type ibucket = cur_key >> shift;
00186 
00187             int_type block_offset = bucket_block_offsets[ibucket];
00188             in >> (bucket_blocks[ibucket]->elem[block_offset++]);
00189             if (block_offset == block_type::size)
00190             {
00191                 block_offset = 0;
00192                 int_type iblock = bucket_iblock[ibucket]++;
00193                 bucket_blocks[ibucket] = out.write(bucket_blocks[ibucket], bucket_bids[ibucket][iblock]);
00194             }
00195             bucket_block_offsets[ibucket] = block_offset;
00196         }
00197         for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; i++)
00198         {
00199             if (bucket_block_offsets[i])
00200             {
00201                 out.write(bucket_blocks[i], bucket_bids[i][bucket_iblock[i]]);
00202             }
00203             bucket_sizes[i] = int64(block_type::size) * bucket_iblock[i] +
00204                               bucket_block_offsets[i];
00205             STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Bucket " << i << " has size " << bucket_sizes[i] <<
00206                                        ", estimated size: " << ((last - first) / int64(nbuckets)));
00207         }
00208 
00209 
00210         delete[] bucket_blocks;
00211         delete[] bucket_block_offsets;
00212         delete[] bucket_iblock;
00213     }
00214 }
00215 
00216 template <typename ExtIterator_>
00217 void stable_ksort(ExtIterator_ first, ExtIterator_ last, unsigned_type M)
00218 {
00219     STXXL_MSG("Warning: stable_ksort is not yet fully implemented, it assumes that the keys are uniformly distributed between [0,std::numeric_limits<key_type>::max()]");
00220     typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::value_type value_type;
00221     typedef typename value_type::key_type key_type;
00222     typedef typename ExtIterator_::block_type block_type;
00223     typedef typename block_type::bid_type bid_type;
00224     typedef typename ExtIterator_::vector_type::alloc_strategy alloc_strategy;
00225     typedef stable_ksort_local::bid_sequence<bid_type, alloc_strategy> bucket_bids_type;
00226     typedef stable_ksort_local::type_key<value_type> type_key_;
00227 
00228     first.flush();     // flush container
00229 
00230 #if STXXL_IO_STATS
00231     stats * iostats = stats::get_instance();
00232     iostats += 0;
00233     // iostats->reset ();
00234 #endif
00235 
00236     reset_io_wait_time();
00237 
00238 
00239     double begin = stxxl_timestamp();
00240     (void)(begin);
00241 
00242 
00243     unsigned_type i = 0;
00244     config * cfg = config::get_instance();
00245     const unsigned_type m = M / block_type::raw_size;
00246     assert(2 * block_type::raw_size <= M);
00247     const unsigned_type write_buffers_multiple = 2;
00248     const unsigned_type read_buffers_multiple = 2;
00249     const unsigned_type ndisks = cfg->disks_number();
00250     const unsigned_type nmaxbuckets = m - (write_buffers_multiple + read_buffers_multiple) * ndisks;
00251     const unsigned_type lognbuckets = static_cast<unsigned_type>(log2(double(nmaxbuckets)));
00252     const unsigned_type nbuckets = 1 << lognbuckets;
00253     const unsigned_type est_bucket_size = div_and_round_up((last - first) / int64(nbuckets),
00254                                                            int64(block_type::size)); //in blocks
00255 
00256     STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Elements to sort: " << (last - first));
00257     STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Number of buckets has to be reduced from " << nmaxbuckets << " to " << nbuckets);
00258     const unsigned_type nread_buffers = (m - nbuckets) * read_buffers_multiple / (read_buffers_multiple + write_buffers_multiple);
00259     UNUSED(nread_buffers);
00260     const unsigned_type nwrite_buffers = (m - nbuckets) * write_buffers_multiple / (read_buffers_multiple + write_buffers_multiple);
00261     UNUSED(nwrite_buffers);
00262 
00263     STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Read buffers in distribution phase: " << nread_buffers);
00264     STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Write buffers in distribution phase: " << nwrite_buffers);
00265 
00266     bucket_bids_type * bucket_bids = new bucket_bids_type[nbuckets];
00267     for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; ++i)
00268         bucket_bids[i].init(est_bucket_size);
00269 
00270     int64 * bucket_sizes = new int64[nbuckets];
00271 
00272     disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::WRITE);
00273 
00274     stable_ksort_local::distribute(
00275         bucket_bids,
00276         bucket_sizes,
00277         nbuckets,
00278         lognbuckets,
00279         first,
00280         last,
00281         write_buffers_multiple * ndisks,
00282         read_buffers_multiple * ndisks);
00283 
00284     double dist_end = stxxl_timestamp(), end;
00285     (void)(dist_end);
00286 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00287     double io_wait_after_d = stxxl::wait_time_counter;
00288     (void)(io_wait_after_d);
00289 #endif
00290 
00291     {
00292         // sort buckets
00293         unsigned_type write_buffers_multiple_bs = 2;
00294         unsigned_type max_bucket_size_bl = (m - write_buffers_multiple_bs * ndisks) / 2; // in number of blocks
00295         int64 max_bucket_size_rec = int64(max_bucket_size_bl) * block_type::size;        // in number of records
00296         int64 max_bucket_size_act = 0;                                                   // actual max bucket size
00297         // establish output stream
00298 
00299         for (i = 0; i < nbuckets; i++)
00300         {
00301             max_bucket_size_act = STXXL_MAX(bucket_sizes[i], max_bucket_size_act);
00302             if (bucket_sizes[i] > max_bucket_size_rec)
00303             {
00304                 STXXL_ERRMSG("Bucket " << i << " is too large: " << bucket_sizes[i] <<
00305                              " records, maximum: " << max_bucket_size_rec);
00306                 STXXL_ERRMSG("Recursion on buckets is not yet implemented, aborting.");
00307                 abort();
00308             }
00309         }
00310         // here we can increase write_buffers_multiple_b knowing max(bucket_sizes[i])
00311         // ... and decrease max_bucket_size_bl
00312         const int_type max_bucket_size_act_bl = div_and_round_up(max_bucket_size_act, block_type::size);
00313         STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Reducing required number of required blocks per bucket from " <<
00314                                    max_bucket_size_bl << " to " << max_bucket_size_act_bl);
00315         max_bucket_size_rec = max_bucket_size_act;
00316         max_bucket_size_bl = max_bucket_size_act_bl;
00317         const unsigned_type nwrite_buffers_bs = m - 2 * max_bucket_size_bl;
00318         STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Write buffers in bucket sorting phase: " << nwrite_buffers_bs);
00319 
00320         typedef buf_ostream<block_type, typename ExtIterator_::bids_container_iterator> buf_ostream_type;
00321         buf_ostream_type out(first.bid(), nwrite_buffers_bs);
00322 
00323         disk_queues::get_instance()->set_priority_op(disk_queue::READ);
00324 
00325         if (first.block_offset())
00326         {
00327             // has to skip part of the first block
00328             block_type * block = new block_type;
00329             request_ptr req;
00330             req = block->read(*first.bid());
00331             req->wait();
00332 
00333             for (i = 0; i < first.block_offset(); i++)
00334             {
00335                 out << block->elem[i];
00336             }
00337             delete block;
00338         }
00339         block_type * blocks1 = new block_type[max_bucket_size_bl];
00340         block_type * blocks2 = new block_type[max_bucket_size_bl];
00341         request_ptr * reqs1 = new request_ptr[max_bucket_size_bl];
00342         request_ptr * reqs2 = new request_ptr[max_bucket_size_bl];
00343         type_key_ * refs1 = new type_key_[max_bucket_size_rec];
00344         type_key_ * refs2 = new type_key_[max_bucket_size_rec];
00345 
00346         // submit reading first 2 buckets (Peter's scheme)
00347         unsigned_type nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[0], block_type::size);
00348         for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks; i++)
00349             reqs1[i] = blocks1[i].read(bucket_bids[0][i]);
00350 
00351 
00352         nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[1], block_type::size);
00353         for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks; i++)
00354             reqs2[i] = blocks2[i].read(bucket_bids[1][i]);
00355 
00356 
00357         key_type offset = 0;
00358         const unsigned log_k1 =
00359             (std::max)(static_cast<unsigned>(ceil(log2(double(
00360                                                            max_bucket_size_rec * sizeof(type_key_) / STXXL_L2_SIZE)))), 1U);
00361         unsigned_type k1 = 1 << log_k1;
00362         int_type * bucket1 = new int_type[k1];
00363 
00364         const unsigned shift = sizeof(key_type) * 8 - lognbuckets;
00365         const unsigned shift1 = shift - log_k1;
00366 
00367         STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Classifying " << nbuckets << " buckets, max size:" << max_bucket_size_rec <<
00368                                    " block size:" << block_type::size << " log_k1:" << log_k1);
00369 
00370         for (unsigned_type k = 0; k < nbuckets; k++)
00371         {
00372             nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[k], block_type::size);
00373             const unsigned log_k1_k =
00374                 (std::max)(static_cast<unsigned>(ceil(log2(
00375                                                           double(bucket_sizes[k] * sizeof(type_key_) / STXXL_L2_SIZE)))), 1U);
00376             assert(log_k1_k <= log_k1);
00377             k1 = 1 << log_k1_k;
00378             std::fill(bucket1, bucket1 + k1, 0);
00379 
00380             STXXL_VERBOSE_STABLE_KSORT("Classifying bucket " << k << " size:" << bucket_sizes[k] <<
00381                                        " blocks:" << nbucket_blocks << " log_k1:" << log_k1_k);
00382             // classify first nbucket_blocks-1 blocks, they are full
00383             type_key_ * ref_ptr = refs1;
00384             key_type offset1 = offset + (key_type(1) << key_type(shift)) * key_type(k);
00385             for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks - 1; i++)
00386             {
00387                 reqs1[i]->wait();
00388                 stable_ksort_local::classify_block(blocks1[i].begin(), blocks1[i].end(), ref_ptr, bucket1, offset1, shift1 /*,k1*/);
00389             }
00390             // last block might be non-full
00391             const unsigned_type last_block_size = bucket_sizes[k] - int64(nbucket_blocks - 1) * block_type::size;
00392             reqs1[i]->wait();
00393 
00394             //STXXL_MSG("block_type::size: "<<block_type::size<<" last_block_size:"<<last_block_size);
00395 
00396             classify_block(blocks1[i].begin(), blocks1[i].begin() + last_block_size, ref_ptr, bucket1, offset1, shift1);
00397 
00398             exclusive_prefix_sum(bucket1, k1);
00399             classify(refs1, refs1 + bucket_sizes[k], refs2, bucket1, offset1, shift1);
00400 
00401             type_key_ * c = refs2;
00402             type_key_ * d = refs1;
00403             for (i = 0; i < k1; i++)
00404             {
00405                 type_key_ * cEnd = refs2 + bucket1[i];
00406                 type_key_ * dEnd = refs1 + bucket1[i];
00407 
00408                 const unsigned log_k2 = static_cast<unsigned>(log2(double(bucket1[i]))) - 1;        // adaptive bucket size
00409                 const unsigned_type k2 = 1 << log_k2;
00410                 int_type * bucket2 = new int_type[k2];
00411                 const unsigned shift2 = shift1 - log_k2;
00412 
00413                 // STXXL_MSG("Sorting bucket "<<k<<":"<<i);
00414                 l1sort(c, cEnd, d, bucket2, k2,
00415                        offset1 + (key_type(1) << key_type(shift1)) * key_type(i),
00416                        shift2);
00417 
00418                 // write out all
00419                 for (type_key_ * p = d; p < dEnd; p++)
00420                     out << (*(p->ptr));
00421 
00422 
00423                 delete[] bucket2;
00424                 c = cEnd;
00425                 d = dEnd;
00426             }
00427             // submit next read
00428             const unsigned_type bucket2submit = k + 2;
00429             if (bucket2submit < nbuckets)
00430             {
00431                 nbucket_blocks = div_and_round_up(bucket_sizes[bucket2submit], block_type::size);
00432                 for (i = 0; i < nbucket_blocks; i++)
00433                     reqs1[i] = blocks1[i].read(bucket_bids[bucket2submit][i]);
00434             }
00435 
00436             std::swap(blocks1, blocks2);
00437             std::swap(reqs1, reqs2);
00438         }
00439 
00440         delete[] bucket1;
00441         delete[] refs1;
00442         delete[] refs2;
00443         delete[] blocks1;
00444         delete[] blocks2;
00445         delete[] reqs1;
00446         delete[] reqs2;
00447         delete[] bucket_bids;
00448         delete[] bucket_sizes;
00449 
00450         if (last.block_offset())
00451         {
00452             // has to skip part of the first block
00453             block_type * block = new block_type;
00454             request_ptr req = block->read(*last.bid());
00455             req->wait();
00456 
00457             for (i = last.block_offset(); i < block_type::size; i++)
00458             {
00459                 out << block->elem[i];
00460             }
00461             delete block;
00462         }
00463 
00464         end = stxxl_timestamp();
00465     }
00466 
00467     STXXL_VERBOSE("Elapsed time        : " << end - begin << " s. Distribution time: " <<
00468                   dist_end - begin << " s");
00469 #if STXXL_IO_STATS
00470     STXXL_VERBOSE("reads               : " << iostats->get_reads());
00471     STXXL_VERBOSE("writes              : " << iostats->get_writes());
00472     STXXL_VERBOSE("read time           : " << iostats->get_read_time() << " s");
00473     STXXL_VERBOSE("write time          : " << iostats->get_write_time() << " s");
00474     STXXL_VERBOSE("parallel read time  : " << iostats->get_pread_time() << " s");
00475     STXXL_VERBOSE("parallel write time : " << iostats->get_pwrite_time() << " s");
00476     STXXL_VERBOSE("parallel io time    : " << iostats->get_pio_time() << " s");
00477 #endif
00478 #ifdef COUNT_WAIT_TIME
00479     STXXL_VERBOSE("Time in I/O wait(ds): " << io_wait_after_d << " s");
00480     STXXL_VERBOSE("Time in I/O wait    : " << stxxl::wait_time_counter << " s");
00481 #endif
00482 }
